commands.name: help
commands.short_description: Show available commands or detailed help for a specific command.
commands.detail:
Usage:
  pypr help           List all commands
  pypr help <command> Show detailed help

commands.name: reload
commands.detail:
New plugins will be loaded and configuration options will be updated.
Most plugins will use the new values on the next command invocation.

commands.name: dumpjson
commands.short_description: Dump the configuration in JSON format (after includes are processed).

commands.name: edit
commands.short_description: Edit the configuration file using $EDITOR (or vi), then reload.

commands.name: validate
commands.short_description: Validate the configuration file against plugin schemas.
commands.detail:
Checks all plugin configurations for errors and warnings.
Works without the daemon running.

Note: Not available in pypr-client.

commands.name: compgen
commands.detail:
Usage:
  pypr compgen <shell>        Install to default user path
  pypr compgen <shell> <path> Install to custom path

Completions include scratchpad names for toggle/show/hide commands.
